blog.title: Capacitive fuel level sensing
blog.content: With electronic system entering the market and putting away mechanical ways of detecting level, electronic system provide much more comprehensive system, where system can be modified easily and provide functionality like alerts, fault detection etc which were never possible with mechanical ways of level detection.

blog.title: 12th edition of IREE
blog.content: FuelScale will present in the 12th edition of IREE its smart fuel telematics system for railways and all high diseal consuming vehicles and machinery.
